https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/wL16oLapLVGK9MDdnkvgM9BioXC.jpg Working in a Boston homeless shelter, Nick Flynn re-encounters his father, a con man and self-proclaimed poet. Sensing trouble in his own life, Nick wrestles with the notion of reaching out yet again to his dad. Being Flynn
